webwork-tex.statement: Find an equation of the plane through the point (5, 4, 5) and parallel to the plane \(-4\!x - 1\!y + 3\!z = 4\). Do this problem in the standard way or WebWork may not recognize a correct answer. \par \mbox{\parbox[t]{3ex}{\hrulefill}} x + \mbox{\parbox[t]{3ex}{\hrulefill}} y + \mbox{\parbox[t]{3ex}{\hrulefill}} z = \mbox{\parbox[t]{7.5ex}{\hrulefill}}
